Title: Requires that certain motor vehicles shall be equipped with operable carbon monoxide detectors
Summary: Requires that for hire vehicles with a chassis which was manufactured and then altered for the purpose of transporting ten or more occupants, including the driver, be equipped with an operable carbon monoxide detector.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that certain motor vehicles shall be equipped with operable carbon monoxide detectors
